*These are the answers to [Questions: Introduction to integration](../questions/qs-introtointegration.qmd).*

**Please attempt the questions before reading these answers!**

## Answers {.unnumbered}

To integrate the expressions, use the power rule for integration

$$
\displaystyle \int x^n \, \mathrm{d}x = \dfrac{x^{n+1}}{n+1} + C
$$

### Q1 {.unnumbered}

1.1. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{1}{5}x^5 + C$

1.2. $\displaystyle \quad x^2 + C$

1.3. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{7}{6}x^6 + C$

1.4. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{3}{2}x^2 + C$

1.5. $\displaystyle \quad -5x + C$

1.6. $\displaystyle \quad x^2 - \dfrac{5}{3}x^3 + C$

1.7. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{4}{3}x^3 + 2x + C$

1.8. $\displaystyle \quad -10x^{-1} - x^2 + C$

1.9. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{1}{3}x^9 - \dfrac{4}{3}x^{-3} - x^2 + C$

1.10. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{5}{2}x^2 + x^{-2} - \dfrac{3}{5}x^5 + C$

### Q2 {.unnumbered}

2.1. $\displaystyle \quad -\dfrac{3}{2}x^{-2} + C$

2.2. $\displaystyle \quad -2x^{-3} + C$

2.3. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{1}{2}x^{-4} + C$

2.4. $\displaystyle \quad -\dfrac{8}{15}x^{-5} + C$

2.5. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{7}{12}x^{-6} + C$

2.6. $\displaystyle \quad -\dfrac{5}{3}x^{-3} - \dfrac{3}{4}x^{-4} + C$

2.7. $\displaystyle \quad -\dfrac{2}{3}x^{-2} + \dfrac{1}{5}x^{-6} + C$

2.8. $\displaystyle \quad -\dfrac{7}{3}x^{-3} + \dfrac{1}{4}x^4 + \dfrac{2}{5}x^{-5} + C$

2.9. $\displaystyle \quad -\dfrac{3}{4}x^{-4} - \dfrac{4}{5}x^{-5} - x + C$

2.10. $\displaystyle \quad -\dfrac{9}{8}x^{-8} - \dfrac{4}{35}x^{-5} + \dfrac{1}{3}x^{-7} + C$

### Q3 {.unnumbered}

3.1. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{3}{4} x^{4/3} + C$

3.2. $\displaystyle \quad 9x^{1/3} + C$

3.3. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{16}{15} x^{5/4} + C$

3.4. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{3}{5} x^{2/3} + C$

3.5. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{5}{14} x^{7/3} + C$

3.6. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{3}{2} x^{4/3} + C$

3.7. $\displaystyle \quad 8 x^{3/4} + C$

3.8. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{1}{4}x^4 + \dfrac{9}{8} x^{2/3} + \dfrac{4}{5} x^{5/4} + C$

3.9. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{5}{6} x^{6/5} - 6x^{2/3} + C$

3.10. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{4}{9} x^{9/4} + C$

3.11. $\displaystyle \quad x^2 - \dfrac{3}{7} x^{7/3} + C$

3.12. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{1}{12}x^4 - \dfrac{2}{7} x^{7/3} + C$

3.13. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{135}{14}x^{14/3} + \dfrac{45}{2}x^{8/3} + 30x^{2/3} + C$

3.14. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{1}{3}x^9 + \dfrac{1}{2}x^8 + x^6 + \dfrac{8}{5}x^5 + x^3 + 2x^2 + C$

3.15. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{32}{19}x^{19/4} + \dfrac{96}{11}x^{11/4} + 24x^{3/4} + C$

### Q4 {.unnumbered}

4.1. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{1}{3}x^3 - 2x + C$

4.2. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{1}{2}x^2 + 3x^{-1} + C$

4.3. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{2}{5}x^{5/2} - 2x^{1/2} + C$

4.4. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{3}{11}x^{11/3} + 3x^{5/3} + C$

4.5. $\displaystyle \quad \dfrac{1}{2}x^4 - x^2 - 3x - 3x^{-1} + C$

4.6. $\displaystyle \quad -18x^{-2} + 8x^{-3} - x^{-4} + C$

4.7. $\displaystyle \quad -\dfrac{16}{3}x^{3/2} - 10x^{-1/2} + C$
